entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then flurries at times heavy changing to 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
